author: Joshua Robinson
title: The Premier League’s Survival Specialist Aims for More
text:
Liverpool, England
In more than 15 years of coaching at the highest level of English soccer, Sam Allardyce has never won a trophy. Nor has he ever been in a title race or secured so much as a top-four finish.
And yet, the bear-sized veteran known as Big Sam has been consistently one of the era’s most sought-after managers, pacing the sidelines... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
